AudioData.Text: Welcome! I'll guide you through this course.
Teleport to the first station. Press and hold the trigger button to aim at the blue teleportation spot. Release the trigger button to teleport there.
First, use the transformer in front of you to make a cube out of the sphere to your left. Grab it by pressing the grab button on your controller. The grab button is on the side of your controller.
Now put it on the highlighted spot on the transformer.
Touch the panel to activate the transformer.
Take the cube and teleport to the next station.
Place the cube on the table.
Now you need to cut this cube in two pieces. First, pick up the tool to your right.
Pick up the cube again and place it on the table.
While holding the tool, you can use it by pressing the trigger button.
Well done! Now slice the cube by moving the blade in the highlighted area.
Great. Release the tool and it will go back to its original position.
Now use the 2 pieces to build a staircase. Pick one of them up and teleport to the large podium. Notice that you can now freely teleport around the area.
Well done! You can now climb the steps!
Now the shield has been disabled, you can grab the ball. To finish this course, you must shoot it through the ring. It will return to the initial position if you miss.
You cannot take the ball while the shield is active. Touch the panel to disable the shield.
Great shot! This concludes the demo process. If you like VR Builder, please make sure to leave a review on the Unity Asset store. We would be grateful!
